name: Outlaws + A Handful of Missions
description: Get ready for the good, the bad, and the even worse. As Marshall James Anderson, you'll face a horde of ornery, gun-slinging outlaws. You'll shoot your way through a twisted plot of greed and revenge. You'll arm yourself with firearms, as well as your wits.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP or newer Processor: 1.8 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 7 DirectX: Version 7.0 Storage: 651 MB available space Sound Card: 16-bit sound card Additional Notes: Mouse, Keyboard
recommended_requirements: Graphics: 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9.0c DirectX: Version 9.0c
